title: SOLD!  T202 Triple Folder Ty Cobb
author: mouschi

posts.post_title: SOLD!  T202 Triple Folder Ty Cobb
posts.post_content:
SOLD!  1912 T202 Ty Cobb / Hughie Jennings – $SOLD net to me after fees/shipping

As if having two hall of famers on the same card isn’t enough, the middle section features baseball’s most famous photograph, ever.  Taken by Charles Conlon, an original of this sold at a record breaking price not too long ago.  Interestingly enough, he didn’t realize he even took the photo until he developed it.  Many of these cards in this grade are wrinkled right down the middle, but this one is not!

[img]https://tanmanbaseballfan.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/IMG_20200102_0005.jpg[/img]

[img]https://tanmanbaseballfan.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/IMG_20200102_0006.jpg[/img]

I'm pretty sure I used to own this card (not sure if I sold it to the seller or if he picked it up whoever I sold it to) and I can vouch for it's quality. Presents much much better than the grade IMO. GLWTS!

[quote name="ronniehatesjazz" post=1954476]I'm pretty sure I used to own this card (not sure if I sold it to the seller or if he picked it up whoever I sold it to) and I can vouch for it's quality. Presents much much better than the grade IMO. GLWTS![/QUOTE]

Thank you brother!  I bought it off ebay early last year - beautiful card but I'm just going a different direction now.
